Method Detail

adduser

boolean adduser(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String password,
                java.lang.String LastName,
                java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String role)
Add a user to the Appsgate user base

Parameters:
id - the login for this user (must be unique)
password - the password to be authenticate
LastName - the user last name
firstName - the user first name
role - the user role in this home
Returns:
true if the user is correctly added, false otherwise

removeUser

boolean removeUser(java.lang.String id,
                   java.lang.String password)
Remove a user from the Appsgate user base.

Parameters:
id - the identifier of the user to remove
password - the password of the user to remove
Returns:
true if the user is removed, false otherwise
